title: Can't disable this trusted_step

labels.name: T-bootstrap
labels.description: Relevant to the bootstrap subteam: Rust's build system (x.py and src/bootstrap)

labels.name: C-discussion
labels.description: Category: Discussion or questions that doesn't represent real issues.

body:
built command was $x.py install -j8
and one worst thing about above command i see that, it always deletes all the previously built libs and tools for all stages ,and rebuild it from stage0.
is there any way to resume the build where it failed last time, rather than cleaning up everything and doing fresh build every time?
And also how can we disable below error, in lib.rs trusted_step is enabled but still throwing this error.

error[E0658]: use of unstable library feature 'trusted_step'
   --> C:\Users\kamle\.cargo\registry\src\github.com-1ecc6299db9ec823\rustc-ap-rustc_index-722.0.0\src\vec.rs:208:21
    |
69  |   macro_rules! newtype_index {
    |  _-
    | |_|
    | |_|
    | |
70  | |     // ---- public rules ----
71  | |
72  | |     // Use default constants
...   |
86  | /         $crate::newtype_index!(
87  |               // Leave out derives marker so we can use its absence to ensure it comes first
88  |               @attrs        [$(#[$attrs])*]
89  |               @type         [$name]
...
93  |               @debug_format ["{}"]
94  | |                           $($tokens)+);
    | |______________________________________- in this macro invocation (#2)
...
208 | |         unsafe impl ::std::iter::TrustedStep for $type {}
    | |                     ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^
...   |
348 | /         $crate::newtype_index!(
349 |               @derives      []
350 |               @attrs        [$(#[$attrs])*]
351 |               @type         [$type]
...
354 |               @debug_format [$debug_format]
355 | |                           $($tokens)*);
    | |______________________________________- in this macro invocation (#3)
...
484 | |     );
485 | | }
    | | -
    | |_|
    | |_in this expansion of `rustc_index::newtype_index!` (#1)
    | |_in this expansion of `$crate::newtype_index!` (#2)
    |   in this expansion of `$crate::newtype_index!` (#3)
    |
   ::: C:\Users\kamle\.cargo\registry\src\github.com-1ecc6299db9ec823\rustc-ap-rustc_span-722.0.0\src\def_id.rs:11:1
    |
11  | / rustc_index::newtype_index! {
12  | |     pub struct CrateId {
13  | |         ENCODABLE = custom
14  | |     }
15  | | }
    | |_- in this macro invocation (#1)
    |
    = note: see issue #85731 <https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/85731> for more information
    = help: add `#![feature(trusted_step)]` to the crate attributes to enable

For more information about this error, try `rustc --explain E0658`.
error: could not compile `rustc-ap-rustc_span` due to previous error
warning: build failed, waiting for other jobs to finish...
error: build failed
thread 'main' panicked at 'Unable to build RLS', src\bootstrap\dist.rs:45:9
note: run with `RUST_BACKTRACE=1` environment variable to display a backtrace
Build completed unsuccessfully in 2:01:32
